name: Dracule Mihawk
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Your Turn] When this Character becomes rested, up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 9 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next End Phase. [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle.
